name: Fiction Fixers - Adventures in Wonderland
description:
Escort Alice in her perilous journey through Wonderland in this hidden object adventure based on the Lewis Carroll classic novel. Search for cleverly disguised hidden objects in many memorable locations. Journey down the rabbit hole and encounter classic characters such as the White Rabbit, Cheshire Cat and the Queen of Hearts.

Keep an eye out for the infamous Illiterati, an evil organization dedicated to the destruction of all fiction in Fiction Fixers – Alice in Wonderland!

This game features an in game unlock.

***Free Version Features***
- Experience the timeless story of Alice in Wonderland!
- Generous free game play suitable for all ages.
- Gorgeous high-definition graphics and sound.
- Best of Hidden Object genre gameplay.

***Full version features***
- Hours and hours of game play after the in-app unlock, perfect for the whole family.
- Unique achievements awarded for stellar performance
- Access to strategy guide for unique insight, tips and tricks!

Download and play today!
